mapper.select: SELECT w.work_no AS workNo, w.work_state AS workState, w.qty, w.part_code AS partCode, p.part_name AS partName FROM worksheet w LEFT JOIN part p ON w.part_code = p.part_code WHERE w.work_no = #{workNo}

SELECT h.part_code AS partCode, d.child_part_code AS childPartCode, p.part_name AS childPartName, d.useage FROM bom_h h LEFT JOIN bom_d d ON h.skey = d.p_skey LEFT JOIN part p ON d.child_part_code = p.part_code WHERE h.part_code IN ( SELECT part_code FROM worksheet WHERE work_no = #{workNo} )
